name: The Juggernaut
description:
"The Juggernaut is a breathtaking tale of wisdom, courage and of overcoming even the most nefarious of monsters. Pairing together spell-binding story telling with his brilliant illustration work, Ryan Gerber intricately spins an imaginative fable full of wisdom and hope, desperately needed in todayâ€™s' ever-changing global climate, yet in such a simple story that even a child could read and love. I highly recommend this work!"
           -Tony Sebastian
            i<3, thessaloniki, greece

114 pages, full color/illustrated, 8x10" paperback edition
